articles.author: Sam Khan Jr.
articles.title: Bedlam's best - The biggest moments in the Oklahoma-Oklahoma State rivalry - ESPN
articles.description: Stunning catches, wild punt returns and lots of points: This is Bedlam. Oklahoma and Oklahoma State will meet for the 115th time on Saturday. Before they hit the field, let's review the best moments that the Sooner State's biggest rivalry has produced.
articles.content:
Bedlam.
In college football, that word evokes thoughts of big plays, dramatic finishes and high stakes in one of the sport's best rivalries: Oklahoma vs. Oklahoma State.
